title: Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When I use the Ctrl+M shortcut to Add Import, nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
OB: The Add Import feature is not ignoring leading/trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: The Add Import feature should ignore any leading/trailing whitespace within the selection.
SR: Please modify the Add Import feature to ignore leading/trailing whitespace within the selection.
